title: The Powers That Be: Global Energy for the Twenty-first Century
description:
Scott L. Montgomery, "The Powers That Be: Global Energy for the Twenty-first Century and Beyond"

Thirty years ago, our global energy landscape did not look remarkably different from what it does today. Three or four decades from now, it certainly will: dwindling oil reserves will clash with skyrocketing demand, as developing nations around the world lead their citizens into the modern energy economy, and all the while, the grave threat of catastrophic climate change looms ever larger.
